categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Gauntlet was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer that had been assigned to the Tapani sector fleet of the Imperial Navy.
The vessel, under the command of Captain Lin Nunsk, served as the flagship of the Sector Fleet, where it patrolled Lamuir IV and escorted bacta convoys on their runs through the Shapani Bypass.
